Title: MP3: Mera Pehla Pehla Pyaar
Writer: Robby Grewal, Sameer Kohli, Arshad Sayed
Actors: Menekka Arora, Sarthak Bhasin, Sagar Chawla, Hazel Croney
Plot: Delhi-based Rohan Sood lives a wealthy lifestyle along with his businessman dad, Shekhar, and mom, Renu. He attends St. Lawrence High School and is friendly with Vasu, Sudhir and Javed, and...
